name: Terrance the Dragon and Pals
description:
Terrence is a good boy lost in a bad world. With enemies out to get him, the only way to get back home is to collect the orbs, and protect himself from danger.

The orbs aren’t easy to get to, though, and as a young dragon all of his powers aren’t yet developed. He will need the help of the friends that he made on his journey, Skylar and Pauline, to use their abilities to help him find his way home. 

Collect the orbs and keep Terrence and his friends safe, to help him get home.

How to Play

Collect the orbs in all 4 levels to help Terrence get home. 

Different levels require different abilities to help the dragons reach the orbs. 

Dragons can’t swim, so when there is water, you’ll need to find another way to get to the orb.

The following dragon friends have these abilities:

Pauline (Red dragon): Fire 

Skylar (Purple dragon): Flying

Terrence (Blue Dragon): Speed

Controls

Point and Click to navigate your dragon around the world

Press F to create flame

Use the Scrollwheel orPress 1, 2 or 3 to change which dragon you control
